rules.cast: Increases your rapport with a visible NPC

details.flavour: If you were words on a card, you'd be some fine print.

rules.cast: Causes a visible NPC to like you.

details.flavour: Do you like raisins? How do you feel about a date?

rules.cast: Causes a visible NPC to become attracted to you.

details.flavour: Here I am - Your other two wishes?

rules.cast: Cause a visible NPC to bond to you for life.

details.flavour: There’s only one thing I want to change about you, and that’s your last name.

rules.cast: Speak with any living NPC. They will be unaware of who they're speaking to.

details.flavour: How'd you get this number? I don't even own a phone!

rules.cast: Speak with any dead NPC. Their voice can be heard by all nearby NPCs.

details.flavour: "Eventually, I tired of speaking with the dead. They never have anything new to talk about." - Dante, Necromancer

rules.cast: Target visible NPC can no longer feel negative emotions towards target visible character.

details.flavour: There is no love without forgiveness, and no forgiveness without love.

rules.cast: Force an NPC to act on their compulsion.

details.flavour: It was a lovely moment, but it'd be just as lovely after checking my messages once more.

rules.cast: Target NPC will believe your next statement.

details.flavour: "Yeah of course I did my homework" - Little Sniver

rules.cast: Change your appearance to match that of another exactly for as long as you'd like.

details.flavour: With just a little bit of complete facial re-construction surgery, you can fool even the closest observers.

rules.cast: Rewrite the contents of an NPC's memory.

details.flavour: "I'm at the end of my rope. I am done with homework. I will simply erase homework from the memory of the people" - Little Sniver

rules.cast: Swap two words in an NPC's vocabulary. They will not be aware of the effect, which lasts for a day.

details.flavour: "You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today." - Edward the Lax

rules.cast: An aura surrounds you. NPCs who fail a perception check believe this spell had the effect of your choice.

details.flavour: "I don't know exactly what he did.. but I just don't feel.. right? Know what I mean?" - Barry the Bandit

rules.cast: Target visible NPC will love you from now on.

details.flavour: Nobody knew what he saw in her.
